procurement_category: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Shoreline Protection in Grand Etang, Nova Scotia (LËpresentation des referencement avant le 10 November)
description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 10 November, 2022 by 1400 EST. All bids submitted after 1400 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The work under this project involves shoreline protection in Grand Etang, Inverness County, Nova Scotia. It includes:.-Mobilization and demobilization.-Removal and stockpiling of existing shore protection for re-use in the new shore protection.-Supply and installation of new corestone, filterstone and armourstone as required for the construction of the new shoreline protection.
